xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: This study was funded by the National Natural Science Funds for Young Scholars (No. 10901166), Sun Yat-sen University Operating Costs of Basic Research Projects to Cultivate Young Teachers (No. 11lgpy99), Macao Science and Technology Development Fund, MSAR. Ref. 018/2014/A1, Macao Government FDCT 098/2012/A3; University of Macau Multi-Year Research Grant (MYRG) MYRG116(Y1-L3)-FST13-QT.

organization.$: School of Mathematics and Computational Science
Macau University of Science and Technology

head.citation-title: Tighter Uncertainty Principles Based on Quaternion Fourier Transform
head.abstracts: © 2015, Springer Basel.The quaternion Fourier transform (QFT) and its properties are reviewed in this paper. Under the polar coordinate form for quaternion-valued signals, we strengthen the stronger uncertainty principles in terms of covariance for quaternion-valued signals based on the right-sided quaternion Fourier transform in both the directional and the spatial cases. We also obtain the conditions that give rise to the equal relations of two uncertainty principles. Examples are given to verify the results.

organization.$: Macau University of Science and Technology

grant-text.$: This study was funded by the National Natural Science Funds for Young Scholars (No. 10901166), Sun Yat-sen University Operating Costs of Basic Research Projects to Cultivate Young Teachers (No. 11lgpy99), Macao Science and Technology Development Fund, MSAR. Ref. 018/2014/A1, Macao Government FDCT 098/2012/A3; University of Macau Multi-Year Research Grant (MYRG) MYRG116(Y1-L3)-FST13-QT.
